docs.snippet: With two candidates from different factions in the running for commissioner of Major League Baseball, a third may emerge as a compromise....
docs.lead_paragraph: With two candidates from different factions in the running for commissioner of Major League Baseball, a third may emerge as a compromise.
docs.abstract: No clear leader has emerged in contest to replace Bud Selig as Major League Baseball's commissioner; some speculate that third candidate could emerge if chief operating officer Rob Manfred or Boston Red Sox owner Tom Werner do not garner enough votes.

headline.seo: Tom Werner Is Trying to Block Rob Manfred’s Bid to Replace Bud Selig
headline.main: Commissioner Vote Could Be Anybody’s Ballgame
headline.print_headline: Commissioner Vote Could Be Anybody’s Ballgame

byline.original: By RICHARD SANDOMIR and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT

docs.snippet: Jarred Cosart allowed three hits and one walk in his first victory since July 7, when he was still with Houston....

docs.snippet: Lee Sung-woo, an avid Royals fan from South Korea, arrived last week for his first visit to Kansas City; since then, the team has lavished him with attention — and has won seven of eight games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lee Sung-woo, an avid Royals fan from South Korea, arrived last week for his first visit to Kansas City; since then, the team has lavished him with attention — and has won seven of eight games.
docs.abstract: Rany Jazayerli Essay on Lee Sung-woo, avid South Korean super-fan of Kansas City Royals who visited team in Kansas City after years of following and writing about them from afar; notes that team has lavished Lee with attention, including allowing him to throw out a first pitch, and has played exceptionally well since his arrival from South Korea.

headline.main: A Fan Visits From Afar, and the Royals Come Alive
headline.print_headline: A Fan Visits From Afar, and the Royals Come Alive

docs.snippet: With Hefner reinjuring his surgically repaired elbow during a rehabilitation start, the Mets were taking a wary approach with the ace Matt Harvey, who also had Tommy John surgery and was rehabbing an elbow as well....
docs.lead_paragraph: With Hefner reinjuring his surgically repaired elbow during a rehabilitation start, the Mets were taking a wary approach with the ace Matt Harvey, who also had Tommy John surgery and was rehabbing an elbow as well.
docs.abstract: New York Mets are taking wary approach to returning pitcher Matt Harvey to field following his elbow surgery; team points to plight of Jeremy Hefner, who reinjured his elbow after returning to play too quickly following surgery, as cautionary tale.

headline.main: For Matt Harvey, Physical Plight of Jeremy Hefner Carries a Cautionary Tale
headline.print_headline: Physical Plight of One Mets Pitcher Carries Cautionary Tale for Another
